texts.name: Pyre
texts.biography: No one knows Pyre's real name, but it is rumored that she was once a member of the Humanists, a foul cult bent on eradicating any non-human inhabitants of Erathia.  Only she knows what motivates her to serve the Devils of Eeofol.

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skill of any Ballista for each level attained after 4th level.
specialty.name: Ballista
